attributes.action: Ban the hijab face covering in public places.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The hijab completely hides the wearer's face, and they are not even made to take it off when going through passport control! This recenty allowed a dangerous criminal to walk out of the country with his sister's passport, and countless more have probably done the same. It also stops people being identified on camera footage if they commit a crime.
